uniequip_002_mudrok.name: Ward of the Fertile Soil
uniequip_002_mudrok.upgradeDescription: Every 9 seconds, gains 1 <$ba.shield>Shield</> (Can have up to 3 stacks, with 1 stack granted immediately when deployed). When a Shield is broken, restores 20% of Max HP and 7 Skill Points

uniequip_002_mudrok.name: Ward of the Fertile Soil
uniequip_002_mudrok.upgradeDescription: Every 9 seconds, gains 1 <$ba.shield>Shield</> (Can have up to 3 stacks, with 1 stack granted immediately when deployed). When a Shield is broken, restores 22% <@ba.talpu>(+2%)</> of Max HP and 7 Skill Points

uniequip_002_judge.name: Guardian of the Law
uniequip_002_judge.upgradeDescription: After deployment, immediately gains a <$ba.barrier>Barrier</> equal to 50% Max HP; When defeating an enemy, gains a <$ba.barrier>Barrier</> equal to 10% Max HP (Cannot exceed 300% Max HP)

uniequip_002_judge.name: Guardian of the Law
uniequip_002_judge.upgradeDescription: After deployment, immediately gains a <$ba.barrier>Barrier</> equal to 55% <@ba.talpu>(+5%)</> Max HP; When defeating an enemy, gains a <$ba.barrier>Barrier</> equal to 10% Max HP (Cannot exceed 300% Max HP)

uniequip_002_hpsts.name: Self-Defense
uniequip_002_hpsts.upgradeDescription: Restores HP by 4% of Max HP per second and obtains 25% Physical Melee Dodge when the skill is activated

uniequip_002_hpsts.upgradeDescription: Restores HP by 5% <@ba.talpu>(+1%)</> of Max HP per second and obtains 30% <@ba.talpu>(+5%)</> Physical Melee Dodge when the skill is activated

uniequip_003_bpipe.name: Precise Reloading
uniequip_003_bpipe.upgradeDescription: When attacking, has a 25% chance to increase ATK to 130% and strike an additional target

uniequip_003_nearl2.name: Brave the Darkness
uniequip_003_nearl2.upgradeDescription: When deploying and defeated for the first time, deals 80% ATK as True damage to enemies in the four adjacent tiles and <$ba.stun>Stuns</> them for 3 seconds. If the previously deployed Operator is from Kazimierz, deals an additional hit
